caption: Charlie found a ball in the room, which was the energy source of all the equipment. Charlie took it and hid with his friends. However, there were two children who were not in the basement. They were caught by the team members in the house upstairs. Through questioning, the team members known that there were only three children underground, there were no adults here. At this moment, the boss of the company also arrived at the scene. He talked to Charlie through the radio. As long as they handed over the energy ball, they can be released, otherwise the two children upstairs will be killed.
